remarks: The trace of a lattice translation other than the identity is an atom. Remark above Lemma C in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 23-May-2012.)
statement:
trlnidat.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
trlnidat.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlnidat.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlnidat.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlnidat.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlnidat $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ F =/= ( _I |` B ) ) -> ( R ` F ) e. A ) $.
